text:
"Oh, pacar [redacted_name]."
"[redacted_name], aku di sini." Aku segera menoleh ke arah [redacted_name].
"Oh, jadi dia pacarmu atau bukan?"
Aku tidak menjawab.
"Bagaimana kau tahu tentang [redacted_name]?"
"Aku baru saja melihat [redacted_name] mengendarai CBR. Ku pikir itu pacarnya jadi aku keluar untuk menyapa, tapi aku tidak melihatnya. Bahkan, aku melihatnya sebentar ketika dia membuka helm. Dia sangat tampan, aku ingin menyapanya."
"Oh, [redacted_name] memujimu atas betapa tampannya pacarmu."
Mendesah
"Jadi, dia pacarmu?"
"Dia bukan pacarnya. Aku hanya bercanda dan juga mengganggunya," kata [redacted_name].
"Oh, kau punya fotonya? Aku ingin melihatnya."
"Ya, page kampus penuh dengan foto nya," kata [redacted_name] sambil mengeringkan tangannya di celemeknya dan mengeluarkan ponselnya, dia mulai mencari foto untuk dilihat oleh [redacted_name]. Aku tidak sengaja menggelengkan kepala sambil meninggalkan keduanya dan pergi mengenakan pakaian biasa dari toko di kamar mandi.
"Aku siap." Aku keluar dari kamar mandi dan melihat [redacted_name] menatapku dan memukul lenganku. Orang lain segera mengangkat ponselnya.
"Apa?" Aku berjalan ke arahnya.
"Tidak ada. Ayo kita cuci sayurannya."
"Ter," aku mengeluarkan suara pelan.
"Apa?"
"Sesuatu telah terjadi?"
"Tidak terjadi apa-apa".
"Kau tidak pandai berbohong. Apa ada sesuatu yang tidak kau ceritakan padaku?"
trans:
“Oh, [redacted_name]'s boyfriend.”
“[redacted_name], I’m here.” I immediately turned to look at [redacted_name].
“Oh, so is he your boyfriend or not?”
I didn’t answer.
“How do you know about [redacted_name]?”
“I just saw [redacted_name] riding a CBR. I thought it was his boyfriend, so I came out to say hello, but I didn’t see him. In fact, I caught a glimpse when he took off his helmet. He’s really handsome; I wanted to greet him.”
“Oh, [redacted_name] praised you for how good-looking your boyfriend is.”
Heaving a sigh
“So, is he your boyfriend?”
“He’s not my boyfriend. I was just joking and bothering him,” [redacted_name] replied.
“Oh, do you have a photo? I want to see him.”
“Yeah, the campus page is full of his pictures,” [redacted_name] said while drying his hands on his apron and pulling out his phone, starting to look for a photo for [redacted_name] to see. I inadvertently shook my head while leaving them and went to change into casual clothes from the store in the bathroom.
“I’m ready.” I stepped out of the bathroom and saw [redacted_name] staring at me, giving my arm a light hit. Someone else quickly raised their phone.
“What’s up?” I walked over to him.
“Nothing. Let’s wash the vegetables.”
“Ter,” I replied quietly.
“What?”
“Did something happen?”
“Nothing happened.”
“You’re not good at lying. Is there something you’re not telling me?”
